specifications.function_description: The system ensures data integrity during Archival Storage transfers by conducting checks for each file and reporting errors. The system offers disaster recovery capabilities including data backup, storage and recovery.
function_specifications: 1.Provides statistically acceptable assurance that no components of the AIP are corrupted during any internal Archival Storage data transfer.
2.Performs routine and special data integrity checking such as Cyclic Redundancy Checks(CRC) or checksums for each individual file and generates error reports.
3.Provides disaster recovery capabilities including data backup, off-site data storage
specifications.absence: inclusion of data recovery
specifications.label: disaster recovery capabilities including data recovery

specifications.function_description: The system supports updates, batch submissions and online updates for individual records. The system can generate management reports and statistics.
function_specifications: 1.Receives updates from other NLM Digital Repository functions(for example, Ingest and Administration).
2.Allows online updates to individual records by authorized staff.
3.Has capability to generate and provide management reports and statistics such as summaries of updates by category, user codes, etc.
specifications.absence: batch submissions
specifications.label: Allows updates to be submitted in batches.

specifications.function_description: The system manages negotiation status and submission agreements, maintaining comprehensive schedules. Users, based on access level, can add or edit agreement terms. Allows setting periodic or ad-hoc submission schedules, managing and monitoring submission volumes.
function_specifications: 1.Tracks negotiation status, written submission agreements and maintains schedules.
2.Able to add and edit terms of agreement.
3.Submission schedules may be set on a periodic or ad-hoc basis.
4.Submission volumes and schedules are managed and monitored.
5.Able to store terms of agreements, and use them to monitor/review/process submissions.
6.Keeps an audit trail of all actions.
specifications.absence: based on access of level to add and edit terms of agreement
specifications.label: Able to add and edit terms of agreement, based on access of level of user.

specifications.function_description: The system allows course administrators to grade assignments, provide feedback via text or attachments, and include timestamps for modifications.  grade details, averages, and overall scores exclusively to relevant users, with privacy ensured. A grade history is maintained.
function_specifications: 1.A course administrator must be able to grade an assignment.
2.The course administrator should also be able to attach feedback in the form of text or an attachment.
3.Time stamps should be attached to the last time the grade was modified.
4.The system should display grade information such as the grade for each assignment, averages, and overall grade.
5.The system should maintain a grade history.
specifications.absence: no mention of prohibiting anyone other than administrators from viewing others' grades
specifications.label: No other actor should be able to view another one's grades except the course administrator.

specifications.function_description: The system offers a search box and button on every page and a dedicated search page with filtering function for the course management system. The results are listed in categories based on relevance that determined by matched terms numbers. Clicking results directs to the corresponding pages. Optionally, the search page can extend searches to the internet via Google.
function_specifications: 1.The system should present a search box and a Search button on the top or bottom of every page.
2.The system should provide a single page dedicated specifically to the task of searching the course management system.
3.The page should allow an actor to filter out certain results and search specific sections(or components) of the course management system.
4.Results should appear in categories based on relevance.
5.When the actor clicks a search result link, they should be taken to the page corresponding to the search result.
6.In addition, the search page described above might allow for the possibility of searching the world wide web using a standard search engine such as Google.
specifications.absence: relevance is determined by results that having the highest number terms matching the search terms.
specifications.label: Relevance is determined by results that having the highest number terms matching the search terms.

specifications.function_description: The system enables simultaneous access and updates to patron and item records by multiple staff members and patrons. Based on privileges, staff and patrons have varying field visibility. Records can be changed and after which alert is needed.
function_specifications: 1.Ability for multiple staff members and patrons to simultaneously access and update patron and item records.
2.Depending on assigned privileges, staff can view all patron and item fields; patrons can access only selected fields.
3.Record changes are applied in a reasonable way.
specifications.absence: action of warning when a record is changed
specifications.label: The system shall warn when a record is changed.

specifications.function_description: The system supports for monitoring resources through configurable alert thresholds. Alerts can be delivered to unlimited recipients via administrative dashboards, email, and text messages.
function_specifications: 1.System supports monitoring of system resources.
2.Alerts can be sent via administrative dashboards, email messages, and text messages.
3.Alerts can be sent to unlimited number of recipients via any or all alert methods.
specifications.absence: action of configuring alert thresholds
specifications.label: Alert thresholds are configurable.

specifications.function_description: The system provides a utility for transferring batches of items between branches. It allows querying candidate materials, saving queries for repeated use, and manually selecting titles. The utility enables move selected items to new location and revert them.
function_specifications: 1.System provides a utility for transferring batches of items between branches.
2.Utility includes ability to query for candidate materials; ability to save queries for repeated use; ability to manually select titles from query results.
3.Utility provides the ability to change records of all or selected items to move to new location.
specifications.absence: ability of reverting items to original location
specifications.label: Utility provides means to revert items to original location after a set period of time

2009 - video search.topic: search video in multiple search engines

specifications.function_description: The system integrates torrent search with the streaming search bar, allowing database updates online. A tick box enables torrent searches. Queries retrieve seeds, peers, file size, date, and webpage link. Results can be ordered with page navigation buttons for result browsing. A no-results message displays if no results searched.
function_specifications: 1.Torrent search will share the same search bar with the streaming search.
2.Database of torrent sites can be updated via the internet.
3.There will be a tick box to allow the user to choose to include torrent searching in the search.
4.Query will retrieve the seed and peers, size of the file, date posted and a link to the webpage itself.
5.If there are results, results will be arranged in size/date/alphabetical order by clicking on the column headers.
6.There will be page button for the user to navigate the results.
specifications.absence: situation of no results were found
specifications.label: If no results are found on a search it will display a message that No results were found for this search.

specifications.function_description: The system features a migration workflow offering a user-friendly API with a single header file. Explicit configuration is mandatory, generating errors if absent. Conversion-related metadata for storage in converted files should be input by user or automatically generated.
function_specifications: 1.The migration workflow shall provide a clear Application Programming Interface (API)to handle the migration process and default configuration.
2.The migration API will require inclusion of only one header file.
3.A configuration must be provided explicitly.
4.The user shall be able to provide metadata related to the conversion that will be stored in the converted files.
5.The system shall automatically generate migration metadata.
specifications.absence: action of generating errors in the absence of a configuration.
specifications.label: Errors should be generated in the absence of a configuration.

specifications.function_description: The system features a migration workflow offering a user-friendly API with a single header file. Explicit configuration is mandatory, generating errors if absent. Conversion-related metadata for storage in converted files shall be input by user or automatically generated.
function_specifications: 1.The migration workflow shall provide a clear Application Programming Interface (API)to handle the migration process and default configuration.
2.The migration API will require inclusion of only one header file.
3.A configuration must be provided explicitly, errors should be generated in the absence of a configuration.
4.The user shall be able to provide metadata related to the conversion that will be stored in the converted files.
specifications.absence: action of automatically generating migration metadata
specifications.label: The system shall automatically generate migration metadata.

specifications.function_description: The system provides remote temperature monitoring and control of a home's environment via a device. Access the current temperature reading at the thermostat position. Adjust the thermostat settings in one-degree increments within a range.
function_specifications: 1.The DigitalHome programmable thermostat shall allow a user to monitor and control a home's temperature from any location, using a web ready computer, cell phone, or PDA.
2.A DH user shall be able to read the temperature at a thermostat position.
3.A DH user shall be able to set the thermostat temperatures to between 60°F and 80°F.
specifications.absence: set the thermostat temperatures at one degree increments
specifications.label: set the thermostat temperatures at one degree increments

specifications.function_description: The system places up to eight thermostats throughout the home, allowing individual or collective control. Each thermostat supports scheduling up to twenty-four one-hour settings per day for each week. If a manual setting is enacted, it persists until the scheduled ends and then reverts to the default setting.
function_specifications: 1.Up to eight thermostats shall be placed in rooms throughout the home.
2.The thermostats may be controlled individually or collectively, so that temperature can be controlled at different levels in different home spaces.
3.For each thermostat, up to twenty-four one hour settings per day for every day of the week can be scheduled.
4.If a thermostat device allows a user to make a manual temperature setting, the setting shall remain in effect until the end of the planned or default time period.
specifications.absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
specifications.label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.

specifications.function_description: The system provides and  change the state of a power switch. Manual switch changes maintain the appliance's state until the end of the current time period, after which default settings resume.
function_specifications: 1.The system shall be able to provide information about the state of a power switch(OFF or ON), indicating the whether an appliance connected to the power switch is OFF or ON.
2.The system shall be able to change the state of a power switch(OFF to ON, or ON to OFF), in turn changing the state of an appliance connected to the power switch.
3.If a user changes the state of power switch device manually, the device shall remain in that state until the end of the planned or default time period.
specifications.absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
specifications.label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.

specifications.function_description: The system provides reports for the system operation status for the past two years. It includes daily average, maximum, and minimum temperature and humidity values for each device, records security breaches with specific dates and times, and indicates any non-operational periods of the DH System.
function_specifications: 1.For a given month and year, in the past two years, DigitalHome shall be able to provide a report on the management and control of the home.
2.The month report shall contain daily average, maximum(with time) and minimum(with time) values of temperature and humidity for each thermostat and humidistat, respectively.
3.The month report shall provide the day and time for which any security breaches occurred, that is, when the security alarms were activated.
specifications.absence: indication of periods when the DH System was not in operation
specifications.label: The month report shall provide a section that indicates the periods of time when the DH System was not in operation.

2010 - mashboot.topic: monitor company presence in social network

specifications.function_description: The system provides options to deactivate user accounts while restricting deactivated users from access. Accounts with history are deactivated. Accounts without history can be deleted. Disabled accounts can be re-enabled, though all except the System Administrator account are subject to disabling.
function_specifications: 1.User Account Deactivation The system allows user accounts to be deactivated.
2.The system denies user who have been deactivated from accessing the system.
3.If an account has no history associated with it, it can be deleted from the system.
4.A disable account can be undisabled.
5.It is possible to disable all accounts except for the System Administrator account.
specifications.absence: situation of an account has any history
specifications.label: If an account has any history associated with it, it can only be deactivated and not deleted.

specifications.function_description: The system offers data backups, and alerts the System Administrator via email for multiple failed logins from the same user. Only valid users can log in. Users are logged out after a configurable timeout set by the System Administrator.
function_specifications: 1.The system allows for the backup of the data system to local or remote non-volatile storage systems.
2.The system is configurable to warn about multiple failed login attempts from the same user.
3.The system allows only valid users to log into the system. A valid user is one which has not been disabled or deleted and exists on the system.
4.The system allows the System Administrator to configure a timeout after which a user is automatically logged out of Mashbot.
specifications.absence: action of sending warnings for failed login
specifications.label: These warnings are sent to the System Administrator.

specifications.function_description: The system enables creation of new users either manually or from a template. When using a template, role-specific settings are inherited automatically, and additional roles can be added.
function_specifications: 1.The user shall be able to create/add a new user manually or from a template.
2.The user record shall inherit all specified role(s) settings in the template when the user record is created from the user template
specifications.absence: action of adding additional roles when creating from a user template
specifications.label: The user shall be able to add additional roles manually while creating/adding a new user from a user template.

specifications.function_description: The system saves user information in the database, associating roles with divisions for new users. It conducts searches on users to confirm user existence. It verifies user status when attempting to add a new user to the system.
function_specifications: 1.The system shall save the user info to the database.
2.The system shall perform a search on the user display name and user name columns in the user tables to find the user and verify the user's existence.
3.The system shall perform a search in the Active Directory to verify the status of the user—Active/Inactive within the company—when the user attempts to create/add a new user in the system.
specifications.absence: action of associating the new user with the divisions
specifications.label: The system shall save the user info to the database with specified roles associated with divisions for the newly created/added user.

specifications.function_description: The system generates a confirmation message upon saving data, and  generates warning message when clicking the cancel button or close button. If cancel button is clicked, all entered data is cleared.
function_specifications: 1.The system shall generate a standard confirmation message after saving data and warning/caution messages after the cancel or close button is clicked.
2.The system shall clear up data if the user chooses to click the Cancel button in the midst of creating/adding a new user.
specifications.absence: situation of clicking the close button
specifications.label: The system shall direct the user to the xxx Page if the user chooses to click the close button without entering any data.
